title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 442 - Retention By Steam Corporations Of Records At Principal Office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 442 - Retention By Steam Corporations Of Records At Principal Office

State Regulations
§ 442.1 - Retention of records at principal office required
§ 442.2 - Notice of transfer

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 442

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
